tasks.title: Enhanced Multi-Institutional Support Architecture
tasks.description: Implement multi-tenant architecture to support multiple educational institutions using the same system with isolated credential management
tasks.details: Extend current single-institution design to support multiple universities. Implement tenant-specific configurations, isolated data storage per institution, and institution-specific smart contract deployments. Update CLI commands to accept institution context, modify database schema to include institution_id in all relevant tables, and implement institution-specific API routing. Add institution onboarding workflow with custom branding and configuration options.
tasks.testStrategy: Create automated tests for multi-tenant data isolation, test institution-specific API endpoints, validate cross-institution data privacy, and perform load testing with multiple institutions simultaneously accessing the system.

tasks.title: Advanced Privacy Enhancement with Attribute Disclosure
tasks.description: Implement granular selective attribute disclosure beyond course-level, enabling students to prove specific attributes like GPA ranges, skills, or competencies without revealing exact grades
tasks.details: Extend current selective disclosure to support attribute-level proofs using zero-knowledge range proofs and predicate proofs. Implement GPA range verification (e.g., prove GPA > 3.5 without revealing exact value), skill attestation proofs, and competency verification. Update Verkle tree structure to support attribute commitments, implement zero-knowledge proof circuits for common predicates, and create user-friendly interfaces for selecting disclosure levels.
tasks.testStrategy: Test zero-knowledge proof generation and verification for various attributes, validate privacy preservation of undisclosed information, benchmark proof generation times, and verify mathematical correctness of range proofs.

tasks.title: Automated LMS Integration Pipeline
tasks.description: Develop automated connectors for popular Learning Management Systems (Canvas, Moodle, Blackboard) to eliminate manual data entry and enable real-time credential updates
tasks.details: Build REST API connectors for major LMS platforms with OAuth2 authentication. Implement data transformation pipelines to convert LMS-specific formats to Verkle-compatible structures. Create webhook listeners for real-time grade updates, automated term processing triggers, and error handling for failed imports. Add support for incremental updates and data validation pipelines. Include LMS plugin development with institution-specific customizations.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration testing with LMS sandbox environments, validate data transformation accuracy, test real-time update mechanisms, verify OAuth security flows, and performance testing with large datasets.

subtasks.title: Design and implement OAuth2 authentication framework for LMS connectors
subtasks.description: Create a centralized OAuth2 authentication system that can handle authentication flows for Canvas, Moodle, and Blackboard LMS platforms with secure token management and refresh capabilities
subtasks.details: Implement a Go-based OAuth2 client library that supports multiple LMS providers. Create configuration structures for different LMS OAuth endpoints, implement secure token storage and refresh mechanisms, and add support for institution-specific OAuth configurations. The system should handle authorization code flows, store encrypted access/refresh tokens, and provide automatic token renewal. Include rate limiting and error handling for OAuth failures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for OAuth flows, integration tests with LMS sandbox environments, security testing for token handling, and validation of OAuth2 standard compliance

subtasks.title: Build REST API connectors for Canvas, Moodle, and Blackboard
subtasks.description: Develop REST API client implementations for each major LMS platform with standardized interfaces for accessing student enrollment and grade data
subtasks.details: Create individual API client packages for Canvas, Moodle, and Blackboard that implement a common interface. Each client should handle platform-specific API endpoints, pagination, rate limiting, and error responses. Implement methods for fetching course enrollments, student grades, term information, and course metadata. Add support for batch operations and incremental data synchronization. Include retry mechanisms and circuit breakers for API reliability.
subtasks.testStrategy: Mock API testing for each LMS platform, integration tests with sandbox environments, load testing for batch operations, and validation of data mapping accuracy

subtasks.title: Implement data transformation pipeline for LMS to Verkle format conversion
subtasks.description: Create a data transformation system that converts LMS-specific data formats into the standardized CourseCompletion structure used by the Verkle tree system
subtasks.details: Build a transformation engine that maps different LMS data models to the existing CourseCompletion struct in packages/crypto/verkle/term_aggregation.go. Handle variations in grade formats (letter grades, percentages, pass/fail), date formats, course identification systems, and credit calculations across different LMS platforms. Implement validation rules for transformed data, handle missing or incomplete data gracefully, and provide detailed transformation logs for debugging.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for data transformation logic, validation tests for edge cases and malformed data, integration tests with real LMS data samples, and accuracy validation against manual data entry

subtasks.title: Create webhook listener system for real-time grade updates
subtasks.description: Develop a webhook receiver system that can handle real-time notifications from LMS platforms when grades are updated, triggering automatic credential processing
subtasks.details: Implement a webhook HTTP server that can receive and validate webhook payloads from different LMS platforms. Create webhook signature verification for security, implement event queuing and processing, and add support for batch processing of multiple grade updates. Integrate with the existing Verkle tree processing pipeline to automatically generate updated term trees when grades change. Include webhook retry mechanisms, dead letter queues for failed processing, and monitoring/logging capabilities.
subtasks.testStrategy: Webhook payload validation testing, security testing for signature verification, load testing for concurrent webhook processing, integration testing with LMS webhook simulators, and end-to-end testing of grade update workflows

subtasks.title: Build comprehensive error handling and monitoring system
subtasks.description: Implement robust error handling, retry mechanisms, and monitoring capabilities for the entire LMS integration pipeline with detailed logging and alerting
subtasks.details: Create a centralized error handling system that categorizes different types of failures (authentication, API, transformation, webhook). Implement exponential backoff retry mechanisms, circuit breakers for failing services, and comprehensive logging throughout the pipeline. Add metrics collection for monitoring API response times, success rates, and data processing volumes. Implement alerting for critical failures and integration with existing monitoring systems. Include health check endpoints and diagnostic tools for troubleshooting integration issues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Error simulation testing, retry mechanism validation, monitoring system integration tests, alert mechanism testing, and comprehensive logging verification across different failure scenarios

tasks.title: Advanced Verification Portal with QR Codes and Mobile Support
tasks.description: Create comprehensive public verification portal with QR code scanning, mobile-responsive design, and instant credential validation for employers and third-party verifiers
tasks.details: Develop mobile-first verification portal with QR code generation and scanning capabilities. Implement PWA (Progressive Web App) for offline verification, camera integration for QR scanning, and InstantVerify functionality. Add employer dashboard for batch verification, verification analytics, fraud detection algorithms, and API for third-party integrator access. Include verification certificates and audit trail generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Mobile device compatibility testing, QR code scanning accuracy validation, offline verification functionality testing, load testing for high-volume verification requests, and security testing for fraud prevention.

tasks.title: Smart Contract Enhancement for Multi-Chain Deployment
tasks.description: Extend smart contract architecture to support multiple blockchain networks (Ethereum mainnet, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base) with cross-chain verification capabilities
tasks.details: Implement multi-chain smart contract deployment with cross-chain bridges for verification. Upgrade IUMiCertRegistry to support chain-specific configurations, implement LayerZero or similar for cross-chain messaging, and add gas optimization strategies for each network. Create chain-specific contract factories, implement cross-chain root synchronization, and add support for L2 scaling solutions.
tasks.testStrategy: Deploy and test contracts on multiple testnets, validate cross-chain messaging functionality, test gas optimization on different networks, verify cross-chain verification accuracy, and perform security audits for each chain deployment.

tasks.title: Enterprise Analytics and Compliance Dashboard
tasks.description: Build comprehensive analytics platform for institutions with compliance reporting, fraud detection, and usage analytics for academic credential management
tasks.details: Create institution dashboard with credential issuance analytics, verification request tracking, and compliance reporting for educational standards (FERPA, GDPR). Implement fraud detection algorithms using machine learning, anomaly detection for unusual verification patterns, and automated compliance reporting. Add real-time monitoring, audit trail visualization, and integration with institutional reporting systems.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate compliance report accuracy against regulatory requirements, test fraud detection algorithms with simulated attack scenarios, performance testing for large-scale analytics processing, and verify data privacy compliance across jurisdictions.

tasks.title: Advanced Cryptographic Features with Time-Bound Credentials
tasks.description: Implement time-bound credentials, automatic expiration mechanisms, and advanced cryptographic features like threshold signatures and credential revocation
tasks.details: Extend Verkle proof system to support time-bounded credentials with automatic expiration. Implement threshold signature schemes for multi-party credential signing, credential revocation without breaking existing proofs, and forward-secure credential updates. Add support for credential renewal workflows, multi-signature institutional approval processes, and cryptographic credential evolution.
tasks.testStrategy: Test time-based expiration mechanisms, validate threshold signature security, verify revocation functionality without affecting valid credentials, and benchmark performance of advanced cryptographic operations.

tasks.title: AI-Powered Credential Intelligence System
tasks.description: Integrate AI/ML capabilities for intelligent credential recommendations, fraud detection, verification pattern analysis, and natural language query processing
tasks.details: Implement machine learning models for fraud detection using verification patterns, credential recommendation engine for students based on academic performance, and NLP interface for natural language credential queries. Add predictive analytics for institutional planning, intelligent credential bundling suggestions, and automated risk assessment for verification requests. Include AI-powered anomaly detection and behavioral analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Train and validate ML models with historical data, test fraud detection accuracy with known attack patterns, validate recommendation system effectiveness, test NLP query accuracy, and benchmark AI processing performance.

tasks.title: Decentralized Identity Integration and DID Support
tasks.description: Implement decentralized identity standards (DID, Verifiable Credentials) and integration with existing identity providers for seamless credential management
tasks.details: Integrate W3C Decentralized Identity standards with current Verkle-based system. Implement DID document creation and management, Verifiable Credential issuance conforming to W3C standards, and integration with identity wallets. Add support for DID methods (did:web, did:key), credential schema validation, and interoperability with existing DID ecosystems. Include credential presentation protocols and selective disclosure using W3C standards.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate W3C standard compliance, test interoperability with existing DID wallets, verify credential portability across different systems, test selective disclosure with W3C presentation protocols, and validate security of DID-based authentication.

tasks.title: Production Deployment and DevOps Infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive production deployment infrastructure with monitoring, scaling, backup systems, and security hardening for enterprise-grade academic credential management
tasks.details: Set up production-grade Kubernetes deployment with auto-scaling, implement comprehensive monitoring using Prometheus/Grafana, create automated backup and disaster recovery systems, and establish CI/CD pipelines with security scanning. Add HSM integration for key management, WAF protection, DDoS mitigation, and comprehensive logging. Implement blue-green deployment strategies and database replication for high availability.
tasks.testStrategy: Load testing for production scale, disaster recovery testing, security penetration testing, infrastructure failover testing, monitoring system validation, and compliance audit preparation for production deployment.
